albums.name: ODESZA
albums.summary: A project rife with brightness and emotion, nostalgic yet rooted in the present, the GRAMMY-nominated duo’s ‘The Last Goodbye’ serves as a sweeping sonic experience that speaks to connection, reminiscence and the impact we impart on one another. It’s a vivid celebration of the people and moments that have left fingerprints on our existence, echoing throughout the record. As the duo’s most personal record to date, it’s a brilliant collection which looks to interweave the past and the present in a euphoric way.
tracklist: 1. This Version Of You (feat. Julianna Barwick) - 2:51

albums.name: ODESZA
albums.summary: A Moment Apart is, at its core, an album about growth, maturity and perspective gained through hard-earned experience. From more than 50 written song, it was whittled down to 16 expansive anthems — each an emotional journey of epic proportions exploring humanity’s intimate moments expressed through glorious chords and layers of textured beats.
tracklist: 9. Everything At Your Feet (feat. The Chamanas) - 3:33
16. Corners Of The Earth (feat. RY X) - 5:03

albums.name: ODESZA
albums.summary: In Return is a well-crafted album that showcases ODESZA's unique style and ability to blend electronic and acoustic elements seamlessly. The album received critical acclaim upon its release and remains a fan favorite in the electronic music scene. This is the second studio album by the electronic music duo ODESZA. The album features a unique blend of electronic and acoustic sounds, combining elements of downtempo, future bass, and indie dance music.

albums.name: ODESZA
albums.summary: Summer's Gone is a strong debut album from ODESZA that showcases their knack for crafting immersive and emotive soundscapes, with a focus on atmospheric textures and mellow melodies. While the album lacks the energy and diversity of their later releases, it serves as a solid introduction to their distinctive style and has earned a loyal following among fans of downtempo and chillout music.
